<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/76086</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76086</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>54e26ac7-dfdb-48b1-ab19-356f541fd3d2#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Irredenta képeslap a Horthy-korszakból</string>
            <string language="en">Irredent card from the Horhy-period</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Irredent Karte von der Horhy-Periode</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Carte d'Irredent de la Horhy-période</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartão de Irredent do Horhy-período</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scheda di Irredent dal Horhy-periodo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάρτα Irredent από τη χορχυ-περίοδο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarjeta de Irredent a partir del Horhy-peri'odo</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Karikatúra arról, hogy a szomszéd nemzetiségek hogyan akarják szétszaggatni Magyarországot.</string>
            <string language="en">Caricature about the neighbour nationalities how they want to tear Hungary</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">irredentizmus,  Horthy-korszak,  Trianon,  nacionalizmus,  </string>
            <string language="en">irredentism, Horthy-period, Trianon, nactionalism</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karikatur über die Nachbarnationalitäten, wie 
sie Ungarn heftig zerreißen möchten</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Caricature au sujet des nationalités voisines 
comment ils veulent déchirer la Hongrie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caricature sobre as nacionalidades vizinhas como 
querem rasgar Hungria</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caricature circa le vicine alle nazionalità 
come desiderano strappare l'Ungheria</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καρικατούρα για τις κοντινές υπηκοότητες πώς θέλουν 
να σχίσουν την Ουγγαρία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caricature sobre las nacionalidades vecinas cómo
desean rasgar Hungría</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">irredentism, Horthy-Periode, Trianon, nactionalism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">irredentism, Horthy-période, Trianon, nactionalism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">irredentism, Horthy-período, Trianon, nactionalism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">irredentism, Horthy-periodo, Trianon, nactionalism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αλυτρωτισμός, χορτχυ-περίοδος, Trianon, nactionalism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">irredentism, Horthy-peri'odo, Trianon, nactionalism</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>76086</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
